data.text: @gingerreckoning I'm thinking of building a garden in my backyard. What sort of flowers attract ghouls, zombies, and revenants and which ones repel poltergeists?
@eremiticjude My brothers outnumbered me and chose what we did. They didn't let me play.
@LAbornTXraised The sides are shaved, so it's technically a really long fauxhawk
@gingerreckoning Whatâ€™s your beef with the ninja turtles?

@AndTheMeltdowns Im gonna go with owldogs. I think that it is possibly more economical to breed. And while I am somewhat unsettled by many of the ways an owldog could present (feathers, a head that turns all the way around), I have a dog who won't stay up past 8:30, so a nocturnal dog seems nice.
@gingerreckoning You inherit a ranch. You can choose to either raise a variety of colored slimes or owl-dog-hybrids. Which do you choose?
